blocks.headingText: World-class wellbeing resources that scale to any number of employees.
blocks.text: Find out how Wellmi can support the wellbeing of your employees and the success of your business.

blocks.headingText: The first wellbeing platform of it's kind is here.
blocks.text: The first cloud wellbeing product of its kind. Supporting employee physical and mental wellbeing on smartphones, desktops and smart watches. Nothing is quite like Wellmi.

blocks.headingText: Supporting thousands of employees around the world

contentCard1.heading: Cirencester College
contentCard1.text: One of the first educational institutions in the UK to support the physical & mental wellbeing of students and staff with the Wellmi app.

contentCard2.heading: Opportunity Hub UK
contentCard2.text: Leading the way with employee support in the recruitment sector. The Opportunity Hub have utilised the Wellmi platform to gain real insight into the wellbeing of their candidates.

contentCard3.heading: NCS
contentCard3.text: Taking the wellbeing initiative into the logistics and haulage sector with the Wellmi platform supporting drivers and support staff alike.

blocks.text:
Mental and physical wellbeing support that isn't defined by time zone, nationality or industry.

Support your employees anytime, anyplace with Wellmi.
